#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 10000007
int dp[10011][7];
int rec(int run,int ball,int wick)
{
    //printf("%d %d %d\n",run,ball,wick);
    if(run<=0)
        return 1;
    if(ball<=0&&wick==0)
        return 1;
    if(dp[run][ball]!=-1)
        return dp[run][ball]+wick;
    if(ball==0&&wick==1)
        return 2;
    if(wick==1)
        dp[run][ball]=1;
    else
        dp[run][ball]=0;
    wick=0;
    //runs
    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-1,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-2,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-3,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-4,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-6,ball-1,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    //wides
    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-1,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-2,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-3,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-5,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    //no balls
    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-1,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-2,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-5,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run-7,ball,wick);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    //wicket
    dp[run][ball]+=rec(run,ball-1,1);
    if(dp[run][ball]>=mod)
        dp[run][ball]-=mod;

    return dp[run][ball];
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,k;
    for(i=0;i<=10000;i++)
        for(j=0;j<=6;j++)
                dp[i][j]=-1;
    for(i=10000;i>=0;i--)
        for(j=6;j>=0;j--)
                rec(i,j,0);
    int t,c=1;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("Case %d: %d\n",c,dp[n][6]%mod);
        c++;
    }
    return 0;
}
